A brief account of some wonderful cures, lately performed by that well known and most highly approved medicine, called pilulæ in omnes morbos, or pills against all diseases. Together with a most useful discovery of the chief signs of the scurvey. Bromfield, M.
1 sheet ([2] p.).
s.n., [London : 1680?]
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
